                          de.javasoft.swing.plaf.JYSwitchButtonUI
                              de.javasoft.swing.plaf.basic.BasicJYSwitchButtonUI
Direct Known Subclasses:
SyntheticaJYSwitchButtonUI
public class BasicJYSwitchButtonUI
extends JYSwitchButtonUI

Basic UI implementation for JYSwitchButton. Optional UI-properties:

  • JYSwitchButton.switch.onText - Text for on state, default is ON
  • JYSwitchButton.switch.onForegrond - Text color for on state, default is WHITE
  • JYSwitchButton.switch.onFontSize - Integer, font size for the ON-switch text, default is general default font size
  • JYSwitchButton.switch.onFontStyle - Integer, font style for the ON-switch text, default is Font.PLAIN
  • JYSwitchButton.switch.onInsets - Insets, padding for ON switch area, default is 1 6 1 6
  • JYSwitchButton.switch.offText - Text for off state, default is OFF
  • JYSwitchButton.switch.offForegrond - Text color for off state, default is BLACK
  • JYSwitchButton.switch.offFontSize - Integer, font size for the OFF-switch text, default is general default font size
  • JYSwitchButton.switch.offFontStyle - Integer, font style for the OFF-switch text, default is Font.PLAIN
  • JYSwitchButton.switch.offInsets - Insets, padding for OFF switch area, default is 1 6 1 6
  • JYSwitchButton.textGap - Integer, space between switch and text, default is 6
  • JYSwitchButton.insets - Insets, specifies empty border size, default is 4 4 4 4

    • Version:
    1.05, 04.12.2010
